Specimen Added By Non-Curator

The user, rolf, added the specimen, Cortinarius sp. NYBG 1234, to the herbarium, The New York Botanical Garden, which you curate.

Here are some handy links:

Show this specimen: http://localhost:3000/specimen/show_specimen/1
Show this herbarium: http://localhost:3000/herbarium/show_herbarium/1
Show user's profile: http://localhost:3000/observer/show_user/2
